summary: This document is a response from Western Union Financial Services, Inc. to a subpoena from the Money Laundering Task Force of the State Attorney's Office in West Palm Beach, Florida. It confirms that records were found and encloses six documents related to requested transactions, indicating a financial investigation.

persons.name: Gino Silvestri
persons.context: The document is addressed to Gino Silvestri at the Money Laundering Task Force, State Attorney's Office in West Palm Beach, Florida, indicating he is the point of contact for the investigation.

events.title: Western Union Subpoena Response
events.description: Western Union Financial Services, Inc. responds to a subpoena (File Number 075686) from the Money Laundering Task Force, confirming records were found and enclosing six documents related to financial transactions.

locations: 401 N Dixie Hwy, West Palm Beach, FL 33401
20 Corporate Hills Drive, St. Charles, MO 63301
keyFacts: A subpoena (File Number 075686) was issued to Western Union by the Money Laundering Task Force of the State Attorney's Office in West Palm Beach, FL.
Western Union's search found records and six documents related to the requested transactions.
The response is dated December 21, 2005, indicating an active financial investigation at that time.
The document is a formal record custodian response, confirming compliance with the subpoena.
The investigation appears focused on money laundering, given the task force name and the financial records requested.
